prodNameC: 美利迪恩新型隱球菌抗原乳膠凝集檢測系統 (未滅菌)
ingredientsDesc: Positive Control (2.5ml). Purified Cryptococcus neoformans polysaccharide antigen containing a preservative.
Sample Diluent (50ml). Glycine buffered saline (pH 8.4 ± 0.1) containing bovine serum albumin and a preservative.
Detection Latex (4ml). Standardized latex particles coated with an optimal dilution of rabbit anticryptococcal globulin, in glycine buffered saline (pH 8.4 ± 0.1) containing a preservative.
Antibody Control (1.5ml). Lyophilized goat anti-rabbit serum containing a preservative.
Catalog #140100 provides enough reagents to perform 50-100 tests depending on the number of controls and titrations included per test run.
Control Latex (5ml). Standardized latex particles coated with an optimal dilution of normal rabbit globulin, in glycine buffered saline (pH 8.4 ± 0.1) containing a preservative.

Negative Control (2.5ml). Lyophilized normal human serum containing a preservative. Each donor unit used in the preparation of this reagent has been found to be nonreactive for Hepatitis B surface antigen, anti-Hepatitis C and HIV-I/ II antibodies by FDA approved test procedures.
Pronase (2 x 2.5ml). Lyophilized with preservative. Each vial contains enough enzyme to treat 10 serum specimens. Meridian catalog #140050.
applicantAddr: 台北市信義區松德路７４號８樓
efficacy: 定性及半定量偵測人體血清和腦脊髓中的新型隱球菌抗體的英膜多醣。

mdKind.mdKindMCodeName: C 免疫學及微生物學裝置
mdKind.mdKindDCodeName: C.3165 新型隱球菌屬血清試劑

factoryDtoList.factoryAddr: 3471 RIVER HILLS DRIVE, CINCINNATI, OH 45244, U.S.A.
